attributes.action: MPs should debate the EU referendum result in Parliament to accept or reject it
attributes.background: The EU referendum was advisory & not mandatory, meaning Parliament should not automatically accept the result. We the undersigned believe that MPs should debate the result and the issues surrounding it in full before coming to a final decision instead of simply ratifying the result.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
